titleBanerHome: Hello, my name is Amir Hossein
descriptionBanerHome: I work in the field of front-end and back-end programming and I work as a freelancer.
descriptionBanerHome2: To know how the website can help your business, contact me and I will guide you.

workSamples.title: You can see my portfolio in the link below
workSamples.body: All templates are HTML and CSS that can be customized according to your needs and you can even order your own user interface design to us so that we can design a special template for you according to your taste.

ourServices.title: our services
ourServices.androidBody: We design Android and iOS applications with the help of Dart and Flutter.
ourServices.reactBody: One-page web applications are designed using React.
ourServices.NodejsBody: With the help of NodeJS engine, we will start the website.
ourServices.ResponsiveBody: Your website will be displayed in the best way in different screens.

site.storeDescription: With a store site, you can put your business online and have a store that works for you 24 hours a day
site.singleDescription: Single-page sites are more of an introduction aspect and are used to better understand your work or profession and are very affordable.
site.managementDescription: Management sites give you the ability to save your work information and display or process them according to your needs
site.companyDescription: Company sites need more explanations due to the work of different parts of the factory, so it needs several pages
